content.question: Which of the following gives the length of the curve <math alttext="y equals, x squared, plus 2 x " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> from <math alttext="x equals 0 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> to <math alttext="x equals 5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="the integral from, 0 to 5, of, open parenthesis, x squared, plus 2 x, close parenthesis, d x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mrow><msubsup><mo>∫</mo><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the integral from, 0 to 5, of, the square root of 1 plus, open parenthesis, 2 x plus 2, close parenthesis, end root, d x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></msqrt></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the integral from, 0 to 5, of, the square root of 1 plus, open parenthesis, 2 x plus 2, close parenthesis, squared, end root, d x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msqrt></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the integral from, 0 to 5, of, the square root of 1 plus, open parenthesis, x squared, plus 2 x, close parenthesis, squared, end root, d x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msqrt></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the integral from, 0 to 5, of, the square root of 1 plus, open parenthesis, 2 x plus 2, close parenthesis, squared, end root, d x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msqrt></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 8.13: (BC ONLY) The Arc Length of a Smooth, Planar Curve and Distance Traveled

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
